Prop.Value: function setColors(sender, e) { var edUsrProfitTotal= px_all["ctl00_phF_form_t0_edUsrProfitTotal"]; var edUsrProfitTotalControl = document.getElementById("ctl00_phF_form_t0_edUsrProfitTotal"); var edCuryProfitTotalPanelControl = document.getElementById("ctl00_phDS_pnlProfitAnalysis_frmLineAllocationLabels_edCuryProfitTotal"); if (edUsrProfitTotal && edUsrProfitTotal.value <= 0) { edUsrProfitTotalControl.style.setProperty('background-color', 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.2)', 'important'); edCuryProfitTotalPanelControl.style.setProperty('background-color', 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.2)', 'important'); } else { edUsrProfitTotalControl.style.setProperty('background-color', 'rgba(112, 173, 71, 0.2)', 'important'); edCuryProfitTotalPanelControl.style.setProperty('background-color', 'rgba(112, 173, 71, 0.2)', 'important'); } }
